name: Rolling Packges
description:
Simple puzzle game where you have to send the right color package.

Esc  to close the application
Click on the turquoise cube to move the selected machine

Hello i'm Leandro, i'm a computer engineering student from Italy.

Made this game solo using ue4. First game jam for me was a cool experience, used blueprints to be faster (a lot of spaghetti nodes too).

Made only 2 levels cause didn't have time to test everything, probably had to make more feedbacks about the machines and to make the player understand better in which state he is. I have done another machine too but didn't have time to make level 3.

Here should be that at some point there are a lot of packages going around the scene (didn't performances with a really a lot of packages)

- Used the cube in the first person puzzle template done by Divivor from the ue4 marketplace, just deformed to create all the other components too

- Music and sounds from freesounds.com and Wowie resources that you can find here on itch.io for free (they are kinda random sounds, and probably missed somes feedbacks there too)

- I did the game mechanics and logic, made in mostly 1 and half day. I choosed a minimalistic style cause i like simple things.

I thank everyone who will give me a feedback about the game.

See you at the next game jam! (maybe? haha)
